idea-plugin.name: BSL - Behavioral Specification Language
idea-plugin.description:
Syntax highlighting and language support for BSL (Behavioral Specification Language) files.

BSL is the open-source specification language for describing AI agent behaviors, invariants, and governance constraints in the AumOS platform.


Features:

  • Syntax highlighting for .bsl files
  • Token-aware color scheme customization
  • Line and block comment support (// and /* ... */)
  • Bracket matching: { }, [ ], ( )
  • Smart indentation
  • Structure view with declaration nodes

Keywords highlighted:

  • Declarations: agent, behavior, invariant
  • Modalities: must, must_not, should, may
  • Clauses: when, degrades_to, delegates_to, receives, escalate_to_human, applies_to, all_behaviors, cases, of, in
  • Metadata: version, model, owner, confidence, latency, cost, audit, severity
  • Operators: and, or, not, before, after, contains

Install bsl-lang CLI via pip for full validation and linting support.
